emotion_responses.angry: I sense frustration. How can I help?
emotion_responses.disgust: Something seems unpleasant. Let me assist.
emotion_responses.fear: You seem worried. I'm here to help.
emotion_responses.happy: Great to see you in good spirits!
emotion_responses.neutral: How can I assist you today?
emotion_responses.sad: I'm sorry you're feeling down. How can I help?
emotion_responses.surprise: Something unexpected? Let me know what you need.
